divs: Sighting Detailsi was getting ready for work had to leave the house at 4am got into my truck drove down to the first stop sign.had to procced to the next road at that rd ther is a traffic light as i waited for it to turn green ther was a flash of light above the deli across the street i thought it was a flash of lighting but as i looked i saw a red becon light and then it dissaperd into thin air it was so fast i thougt i was seeing things...
Summary: a flash then a red blinking light
trends: There have been no other sightings in Dingmansferry
This sighting has never been favorited.
